About Me

BIO

In 2018, I drew a line under almost a decade of success working in secondary schools, to pursue my dreams of working in web development. For almost a year, I would finish a day of educating young people by schooling myself in code every evening. While my story isn’t unique, I believe that my experience in digital project management, albeit within the education sector, sets me aside from my peers.

Kenton School

Teacher

In the last academic year, my results and attainment were in the top 5% of the school, and lessons were frequently ranked as ‘Outstanding’. Despite learning code, I valued the future of my students as at least equal to my own.
